testcase.name: Verify whether the user is able to login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application..............................................passed And I navigate to login page................................................passed When I Login to application using username "tusharnangre5446@gmail.com" and password "tushar1234".passed Then I should see that user is able to login successfully...................passed

testcase.name: Verify whether user is able to login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application..............................................passed And I navigate to login page................................................passed When I Login to application using username "tusharnangre5446@gmail.com" and password "tushartest".passed Then I should see validation message for incorrect credentials..............passed

testcase.name: Verify whether user is able to login without providing credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application..............................................passed And I navigate to login page................................................passed When I Login to application using username "" and password ""...............passed Then I should see validation message for incorrect credentials..............passed

testcase.name: Verify whether user is able to reset the forgotten password
testcase.system-out: Given I launch the application..............................................passed And I navigate to login page................................................passed When I reset the forgotten password for email "tusharnangre5446@gmail.com"..passed Then I should see a message informing the user that information related to resetting password have been sent to email address.passed
